name: iabot
title: IABot Management Interface
subtitle: The front-end control panel to configuring and directing InternetArchiveBot's activities.
description: This is a tool where users can easily find and repair dead links on supported wikis.  They can also queue InternetArchiveBot up onto a list of pages, help correct erroneous entries in the DB, and report bugs.
keywords: iabot, internetarchivebot, management, interface, linkrot, bot, dead, link, fixing
